1. U.S. hits $38 trillion in debt, after the fastest accumulation of $1 trillion outside of the pandemic  PBS

  4. US national debt surpasses a record $38 trillion  Al Jazeera
  5. VOTE: Do you trust current members of Congress to address the rising national debt?  The National Desk
